Plot: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, a manipulative, obsessively compulsive narcissist, tracks him down during his family vacation.
Title: What About Bob?
Writer: Alvin Sargent (story), Laura Ziskin (story), Tom Schulman (screenplay)
Actors: Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty, Charlie Korsmo
tomatoConsensus: Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss' chemistry helps make the most of a familiar yet durable premise, elevating What About Bob? into the upper ranks of '90s comedies.
